data.text:
@basisspace As a father, Watching it by eyes, and hurting it inside the heart, I sincerely ask you to investigate my son's account and unblock his account because he need this account.
I am not deny your anti-cheating system.
@basisspace but on January 21, 2022, his CSGO was wrongly banned, He told me that he didn't use cheating software, he was very sad and frustrated, he didn't speak every day, he didn't speak much.

@basisspace I am a father from China. My son is a stomach cancer patient.He has been undergoing chemotherapy for 3 months and now his hair is gone fell out. His favorite game is your CSGO. Because of your CSGO, he suffers from illness but is still optimistic. https://t.co/EoUitXSuFW
@basisspace Shame there's no covid vaccine for 2-4 age group
@basisspace Huzzah! Step one of getting to see you all again soon! :-)
